title: Nvidia Discloses Investment in SoundHound AI: Analysis and Considerations for Investors
description: Nvidia, a powerhouse in artificial intelligence (AI) investments, has recently disclosed at least $100 million, including SoundHound AI in its portfolio. title: Detecting Deepfakes: How to Spot AI Fakery Online
description: With the rise of generative artificial intelligence tools, the proliferation of deceptive pictures, videos, and audio, commonly known as deepfakes, has become a significant concern online. title: Filecoin Falls 11.9%, Whales Join ‘Black Account’ New Exchange Token Priced $0.0181

title: BlackRock Embraces Ethereum: Launches First Tokenized Fund Amid ETH Allegations
description: BlackRock has launched the BUIDL Fund on Ethereum, its first tokenized fund on a public blockchain, fully collateralized by cash and US Treasury bonds, with customers earning USD yields. Investors can now trade their fund shares on a transparent blockchain with instant settlement, with BNY Mellon facilitating interoperability with traditional markets. title: BlackRock’s Clients Expressing ‘Little Bit’ of Demand for Ethereum, According to Head of Digital Assets: Report
description:
Clients of $10 trillion asset management firm BlackRock are reportedly not showing much demand for the leading smart contract platform Ethereum (ETH). Robert Mitchnick, BlackRock’s head of digital assets, says that the firm’s clients are mostly interested in Bitcoin (BTC), the top crypto asset by market cap, leaving only a “little bit” of demand for […]
